plugin-data.name: Sitemap table generator
plugin-data.description: This plugin generates a HTML table from the pages.json. The table can be searched and sorted.

header-sitemap-example: The tables header and the plaintext to it. The order must match the order from the JSON file. Example: 'dateRaw Date|permalink Link|...'
pages-json-path: Relative path to the pages.json file
webhook-sitemap-explanation: The sitemap table can be reached under this address (www.example.com/webhook).
page-title-example: If a page title exists, an h1 heading is added on top.
enable-searchbar-example: If the search field is enabled (1 or true), the search field will be displayed.
enable-column-sort-example: If column sorting is enabled (1 or true), each column can be sorted individually.
